column5: We are thinking of booking an Ontario fly in trip next year and have heard that some places do not allow pets. Can anyone recommend a high quality outfitter with good wallye-pike lakes that will allow dogs?Thanks in advance for your cooperation.
Check out Albany River Outfitters in Pickle Lake.
www.waynorthlodge.ca. Great trophy pike and walleye.
www.rustymyers.comwww.wildewoodflyin.comGreat fishing at either. Just e mail them about the pet.
Would you consider a boat-in lodge? I work at one in Manitoba a few miles west of the ontario border on the winnipeg river and pets are welcome. www.eaglenest.mb.ca
Thanks for the info. Keep it comming!! We just like to have fun with the dog - that is part of the experience for us. Any more resorters out there????
Our site will be on WC in a day or two...just registered. Look us up at www.whitefishbaycamp.com We are a boat in on LOTW, just 75 miles from Int. Falls, MN Have a great trip to Canada Bob and Peg
Thanks Bob - we'll stop by at the show this Winter and talk.
